# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#22)

#### Question

What was your favorite non Wheel of Time book to write?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I would say
*The Way of Kings*
.
